author: Adam Vaughan
title: Coronavirus will play out very differently in world's poorest nations
description: Cases of covid-19 have been slow to appear in developing economies, but now they are ramping up. Slums and refugee camps could be particularly vulnerable
content:
By Adam Vaughan
Children wearing facemasks in Nairobi, Kenya
Donwilson Odhiambo/ZUMA Wire/PA Images
The new coronavirus may prove disastrous for the worlds poorest people, including those living in slums and refugee camps.
Cases were slower to appear in d… [+5568 chars]
